songs.title: Happily (Acoustic)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Harry]
You don't understand, you don't understand
What you do to me when you hold his hand
We were meant to be but a twist of fate
Made it so you had to walk away

[Pre-Chorus: Zayn, Harry]
'Cause we're on fire, we are on fire
We're on fire now
Yeah we're on fire, we are on fire
We're on fire now

One, two three!

[Chorus: Harry, Louis]
I don't care what people say when we're together
You know I wanna be the one
Who'll hold you when you sleep
I just want it to be you and I forever
I know you wanna leave so come on
Baby be with me so happily

[Verse 2: Liam, Louis]
It's 4 a.m. and I know that you're with him
I wonder if he knows that I touched your skin
And if he feels my traces in your hair
I'm sorry, love, but I don't really care

[Pre-Chorus: Liam, Niall]
'Cause we're on fire, we are on fire
We're on fire now
Yeah we're on fire, we are on fire
We're on fire now

One, two, three!

[Chorus: Niall, Liam, Louis]
I don't care what people say when we're together
You know I wanna be the one
Who holds you when you sleep
I just want it to be you and I forever
I know you wanna leave so come on
Baby be with me so happily

[Bridge: Liam, Harry, Zayn]
So happily
One, two, three, four!
Oh oh oh, oh oh, oh oh oh oh
We're on fire now
So happily
Oh oh oh, oh oh, oh oh oh oh
We're on fire now
We're on fire
Oh oh oh, oh oh, oh oh oh oh
We're on fire now
I don't care, yay

[Interlude]

[Chorus: Harry, Niall, Louis, Liam]
I don't care what people say when we're together
You know I wanna be the one
Who holds you when you sleep
I just want it to be you and I forever
Yeah, yeah!
I know you wanna leave so come on
Baby be with me so happily

I don't care what people say when we're together
You know I wanna be the one
Who holds you when you sleep
I just want it to be you and I forever
I know you wanna leave so come on
Baby be with me so happily
